title: Each sip brings the Beach 0.1% closer. Not metaphorically. Measurably. Dot tracks the progress with obsessive precision, his calculations confirming what every agent feels instinctively: these drinks are not mere beverages but tools of reality manipulation. The recipe remains a mystery, though fragments suggest quantum entanglement of lime essence, rum particles existing across multiple timelines, and ice that remembers every state it has ever been.
